In England, in the seven days to 01 March, there were 41,862 new confirmed cases (74.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 February, there were 63,442 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 34% (21,580 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 March is 3,689,842 (6,555.4 cases per 100,000 population).
